Class WeightedTerm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.highlight.WeightedTerm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    WeightedSpanTerm

    public class WeightedTerm
extends Object
    Lightweight class to hold term and a weight value used for scoring this term
